description: create an app in a light module
option-contentType-description: configure the content type by creating a new type or choosing an existing one (recommended singular)
option-lightModule-description: set the light module for the app; defaults to the directory specified in mgnl.config.js file
option-prototypeDir-description: use the specified path to the custom prototype templates directory as the prototype source for app creation

option-prototype-description.with-prototypes: select a prototype for app creation; available prototypes include: [{{prototypes}}]
option-prototype-description.no-prototypes: select a prototype for app creation; provided prototype-dir: "{{path}}" doesn't exist, no prototypes available
